#4 & 5

```{r}
require(dplyr)
require(pander)
d1 <- read.csv("https://tgstewart.cloud/soda.csv") |>
  filter(!is.na(cola) & !is.na(sugar))
descr::CrossTable(
      d1$sugar
    , d1$cola
    , prop.chisq = FALSE
) |>
pander(split.table=Inf)
```
